import React from "react"; import { HandySvg } from "handy-svg"; import styles from "./Post.module.scss"; export function Post({ sender, content, likeContent }) { return (
{sender.publisher} {sender.time}
{sender.subscription ? ( ) : ( )}
{content.article}
{content.mediaContent.map((item, index) => { return <>{item.type === "img" && }; })}
); }
